message.content:
{"id": "9654", "title": "Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details", "description": "The Modify Parameters dialog has several issues:

- The name validation check is duplicated on the first page.
- The first and second columns could be merged for a better user experience.

Here are some observations and suggestions:

a. The buttons in the dialog are too small, which makes them difficult to click.

b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.

c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.

g. The dialog comes up as too large for methods with many parameters.

", "OB": "a. The buttons in the dialog are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
g. The dialog comes up as too large for methods with many parameters.", "EB": "The first and second columns should be merged for a better user experience.", "SR": "The name validation check should only be performed once on the first page."}
